Comments_List: I have learned a lot about Algebra and Calculus. And my calculation ability has been enhanced a lot.

I have learnt linear algebra and calculus of functions of several variables in this course. My ability to deal with matrix greatly improved throughout the practice. What's more, some examples which are closely related to economics and real world have been combined in class, and I suppose they are very helpful in introducing how math can be applied.

Strengths: thorough coverage of matrix algebra and related concepts

Weaknesses: its not obvious what the link is between the content in the first half of the course (matrix algebra) and the second half of the course (calculus)

This course is useful and good, with proper amount of homework to practice. Sometimes the in class quiz had more questions than we could do in 30 minutes so the instructor kindly gave us more time to finish. However it influenced the pace in class and we ran out of time as a result. I suppose it will be better if one question is cut off in some quizzes.
The homework is graded so strict that it took lots of useless work to write out every single details

Yes I will. This course is beneficial for those who has some background in economics and wants to use math as a tool to do better research. Lots of basic but important knowledge are involved in this course. I really enjoyed learning it.
